name: Brand Design Brief Template
description: The best brand design brief template, built in Notion and Google Docs.Use this template as a system for defining, organizing, and presenting your next brand project.Bring structure and clarity to every branding project — from discovery to delivery.This all-in-one Brand Design Brief Template helps you capture every essential detail of a client’s brand, align stakeholders, and set a clear creative direction before design even begins.Whether you’re an independent brand designer, studio owner, or st
features: Notion Template– ideal for collaborative use and client-facing documentation; Google Docs Template– easy to duplicate, edit, and share; Project Overview– define scope, context, and goals; Objectives and Success Metrics– align on measurable outcomes; Brand Background– document mission, vision, and values; Audience and Market– identify key segments and positioning; Competitor Analysis– map opportunities and market gaps; Brand Personality and Tone– define how the brand speaks and feels; Creative Direction– guide visual and verbal expression; Deliverables and Scope– clarify exactly what’s being produced
